name: Snakest
description:
We all know we love snakes, right? Even if you afraid of snakes, you was in love by playing Snake game on your mobile phones while you was young. That game is nothing special but classic version of Snake with mods.

You objective is eat all the "foods" inside the camp.

You can change everything in the game, the color of snake, velocity, camp color etc.

Have fun and play this classic game.

How far can you go?
